info.title: FortiOS Monitor
info.description: REST API for configuring FortiOS objects and settings

license--status--select--definitions--la.title: Last Update
license--status--select--definitions--la.description: Timestamp of when license was last updated.

license--status--select--definitions--la.title: Last Update Attempt
license--status--select--definitions--la.description: Timestamp of when last attempt was made to update license.

license--status--select--definitions--la.title: Last Update Result Status
license--status--select--definitions--la.description: Status of last attempt to update license.

license--status--select--definitions--la.title: Last Update Method
license--status--select--definitions--la.description: Method which caused last update of license.

license--status--select--definitions--ex.title: License Expiry
license--status--select--definitions--ex.description: Timestamp of when license will expire.

license--status--select--definitions--de.title: Deprecated
license--status--select--definitions--de.description: True if the license type is deprecated.

get.summary:
Get current license & registration status.
Access Group: any

schema.title: License Status
schema.description: License status of FortiOS features and services.

is_payg.title: Pay as You Go
is_payg.description: True when the VM is pay as you go.

validation_overdue_since.title: Validation Overdue
validation_overdue_since.description: Number of seconds that validation has been overdue for.

cpu_used.title: CPU Used
cpu_used.description: Number of CPU cores used on this FortiGate.

cpu_max.title: CPU Max
cpu_max.description: Maximum number of CPU cores specified by license model.

mem_used.title: Memory Used
mem_used.description: Memory used in bytes on this FortiGate.

mem_max.title: Memory Max
mem_max.description: Maximum about of memory specified by license model.

vmx_instance_used.title: NSX VM Instances Used
vmx_instance_used.description: The number of VMware NSX VM instances used.

vmx_instance_max.title: NSX VM Instance Max
vmx_instance_max.description: The maximum number of VMware NSX VM instances allowed.

device_os_id.title: Device OS ID
device_os_id.description: Device Operating System ID license status.

geoip_db.title: IP Geography Database
geoip_db.description: FortiGuard IP geography database object status.

trusted_cert_db.title: Trusted Certificate Database
trusted_cert_db.description: FortiGuard trusted certificate database object status.

local_in_virtual_patching.title: Local in Virtual Patching
local_in_virtual_patching.description: Local in Virtual Patching license status.

sdwan_network_monitor.title: SD-WAN Underlay and Application Monitoring
sdwan_network_monitor.description: SD-WAN Underlay and Application Monitoring license status.

used_bytes.title: Used Bytes
used_bytes.description: Bytes used in FortiGate Cloud logging.

max_bytes.title: Max Bytes
max_bytes.description: Max bytes of storage for FortiGate Cloud logging.

log_retention_days.title: Log Retention Days
log_retention_days.description: The number of days FortiGate Cloud logs are retained.

fortiguard_ai_based_sandbox.title: FortiGuard AI Based Sandbox
fortiguard_ai_based_sandbox.description: FortiGuard AI Based Sandbox license status.

fortimanager_cloud_alci.title: FortiManager Cloud Account Level License
fortimanager_cloud_alci.description: FortiManager Cloud Account Level License status.

fortisandbox_cloud_alci.title: FortiSandbox Cloud Account Level License
fortisandbox_cloud_alci.description: FortiSandbox Cloud Account Level license status.

max.title: Max
max.description: The maximum number of VDOMs allowed.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

post.summary:
Upgrade or downgrade UTM engine or signature package (IPS/AntiVirus/Application Control/Industrial database/Security Rating/Internet Service Database) using uploaded file.
Access Group: sysgrp.upd

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Possible parameters to go in the body for the request.

confirm_not_signed.description: Confirm whether unsigned pkg files may be uploaded.

confirm_not_ga_certified.description: Confirm whether non GA-certified pkg files may be uploaded.

file_id.description: File id of existing pkg file from a previous upload.

file_content.description: Provided when uploading a file: base64 encoded file data. Must not contain whitespace or other invalid base64 characters. Must be included in HTTP body.
